name: NSWorkspace.IconCreationOptions
desc: Constants that describe options for creating icons.

items.name: static var excludeQuickDrawElementsIconCreationOption: NSWorkspace.IconCreationOptions
items.desc: An option to suppress generation of the QuickDraw format icon representations that are used in macOS 10.0 through macOS 10.4.

items.name: static var exclude10_4ElementsIconCreationOption: NSWorkspace.IconCreationOptions
items.desc: An option to suppress generation of the new higher resolution icon representations that are supported in macOS 10.4.

items.name: init(rawValue: UInt)
items.desc: Initializes an icon creation option using the specified raw value.
